Item the sammyn dai the Aldirman and a grete part of the gilde avisitly considering
the gude obseruance and diui seruice that the vicar' and chaplanys vphaldis and dois
in the kirk and in hope of gude continuacion / has grauntit to the said vicar'
and chaplanys that continowis divyne service / that thai sall haue thair' lairis
quhen thai discess' free in quhat place of the kirk it plesis thaim to ly of
thair' deuocion

Item it grauntit give ony chaplanrie or seruice perpetuale or temporale beyng
at the presention presentacion or disposicion of the comunitee of this burgh'
happynnis to vake sic chaplanrie or seruice sal be erast disponit and providit
to the chaplanys that kan best and makis maste continuale seruice in the'kirk' omitted following 'the'?
be avis' and counsaile of the vicar' and chaplanys forsaid

The secundai' of the moneth' of Decembre Anno supradicto / the aldirman and the
hale counsaile gaderit has chosin Androw Culane John' of Scrogis the son'
Androu alaneson' matheu fichet John' voket and Will rollande for til
ende and til fynd in quhais handis of the toune' al dettis aucht til our'
souerane lorde the kyng alsweil of the reist of the hundreth' lib' g' and the
diffrais' of it as of bailyeis comptis to the dai of the date of this
writ / the quhilk forsaid personis ar sworn' the gret auth' lelely and treuly
to sers' and decerne the said mater eftir thar' knawlage be the sis sicht' of
richarde of Kyntor aldirman sworn' thar' to / And quhat ende at the saide
persones makis in the said caus' to be kepit without ony stoppyn'

The samyn dai it was appoynttit and fullely accordit betuex the aldirman
and the comowne' consaile of this burgh' on that A part and maistir John'
of levingstone' vicar' of Inuerrugy on' that othir part anens the biggyne
of the bryg on' the vatir of Dee in maner and forme as eftir folowis / that is
to say / at the said maistir John' has tane on hande to be maistir and gouernowr'
of the said wreth' werk be the sicht' and avis' of the aldirman' and consail
to the quhilk werk / the forsaid aldirman and consaile' sal gif yherly' for the
termes of ten yheris xx lib' of thar' commowne purs'

The xxj dai of Decembre / the yher' forsaid / It was ordanit that a balyhe
sal pass' with' Elisabeth' the dochtir of vmquhile of Will caleman and
ken hir' til the fee of hir' fadre land liand on north' the half of the
nethir' kirkgate with' the pertenancez / apon vndir condicion that scho sal
nothir' sell wedset analy na mak warr' the said land / and quhat
tyme that hir' brothir' the quhilk is lachfull' air' happynnis tocum
hame, scho sal freli but obstakil resigne and give owre the said
land with' the pertenancez til hir' said brothir' or his procuratouris
and thar'to scho has fundin William scherar' borch' And as for
this yher' scho na nane on hir' behalf sal haue ony intromettyng
with' the said / land / bot the aldirman and counsaile sal depute a man
to govern the land / and dispone the profite of it be thair' avis'
nota Jacobus Crak finiuit pro forisstallacione pro xiij s' iiij d'

The xiiij dai of the moneth' of februar' yhir' of gode et cetera lviijo ter it was accordit
and fullely appoyntit betuex petir of strivyling freir and minister of the triniteis of the burgh'
of Abirdene on' that a part and ser androu androw' hendirson chaplayne on' that othir part anence the
chaplaynry of sanct nicholace altar' in maner and forme as eftir folowis that is to sai
that the said minister sal ger' the saide ser androu be content and payit of vj marcis
for a yer' tocum next falowande the date of thir' presentez' in trouth' of concorde to
be maide betwex the saide partiis and to se tho euidentis of the saide chaplaynery in the
meyn tyme / the quhilk cordance was made be ser John' of ogilvy maistir Walter Idil
officiale' of Abirdon Richard of Kintor aldirman and generaly the hale consaile of the saide
burgh'

The ferde dai of the moneth' of maij yher' forsaid jM ccccC lixo thir' persones out burgis vndir
writynne war commandit at thai suld nocht seil be richard of Kyntor and th aldirman and the
hale communitee of this burgh' bot gif thai made residens within the burgh' the quhilk
persones fand sickyr' suuerte to remane within the burgh' at thar' hame cummyn of this
next rais' In the first James crak fand John stewart borgh' vndir the payne' of x mark
or ellis to gif our' his fredome Item Wil gray the sammyn vys' fand land and gud Item
Alexander leiche has fundyn' Androu meignes of the sammyn wys' / Item John' gregory
has fundyn' for hym on the sammyn wis' Dauid blabre

Item quhen the said persounes come hame owt of flaundris the x dai of Julij / the yher'
forsaid / the Aldirman gert call the sammyn persounes and renewit the borowes and
paynis forsaid / and thai war oblist to remayne in this burgh' bath' with' thair'
bodijs and gudes vndir the said paynes

Item the sammyn dai thomas maliceson' fand maistir John' of Cadiou borch' that he
suld vs' na merchandis' in the cuntreth' vndir the payne forsaid

p.hi:
Burgenses et confratres gilde facti tempore prepositure
Ricardi Kintor Anno Domini et cetera quinquagesimo Nono

div.p:
Reuerendus in christo pater et dominus Thomas Episcopus Abirdonensis
de consenu confratrum gilde receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et
confratrem gilde prestito Juramento .

burgensem et confratrem gilde prestito Juramento pro v s' j d' ob' in bursa

Item the xxviij day of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxiij yeris al clamys and debatis movit
betuix thome traile and thome club his cosing anent the bying and selling of a lande that
thome traile induellis lyande in the scoule hill' salde be the said' thome club to the said' thome
traile was frely giffin our' on bath' the sydis' na nane of thaim to clame vthir' in tyme to cum
of the biyng na selling of the saide landis with the pertinens bot the saide thome club fully payit of the
sommys promest him for it and the saide thom traile to bruk and joys' the saide lande with the pertinens
heretabilly and his airis for euermar' but demawnde / of the said thome club or his airis or as
signays in tyme to cum /

Johannis lwndoris suprascriptus ex gracia consilij receptus fuit In confratrem gilde huius
burgi presto prestito solito Juramento et cetera

Decimo nono die mensis Nouembris Anno Domini et cetera lixo Comparens personaliter
Johannes de Scrogis pater / declarauit / quod alias inter quondam Alexandrum Scrogis primogenitum
filium suum ex vna et Johannem scrogis filium secundo genitum partibus ex altera presente et consen
siente eodem Johanne scrogis patre appunctuatum fuit quod ipse Johannes pater daret et infeo
daret dictum Johannem filium suum de duobus croftis suis Jacentis in teretorio croftorum huius burgi
vnum videlicet inter Riuulum siue paludem propre domos leprosorum ex parte boriali et croftum Johannis
Voode ex parte australi et altrum inter croftum domus fratrum predicatorum huius burgi ex parte
boreali et croftum heredum quondam Walteri berclai de garntuly ex parte al australi q Ad
quam feodacionem faciendam Ipse Johannes pater de consensu prefati quondam Alexandri filij suj
et apparentis heredis firmiter fuerat obligatus Vnde ipse volens huiusmodi obligacionem satisfacere
ipse dicta crofta in manibus Andree scherar' vnius balliuorum dicti burgi pro cirothece
sue tradicionem sursum reddidit et resignauit ad illum finem quod ipse saisinam eorundum dicto
Johannj scrogis filio suo secundum tenorem carte sue traderet et deliberaret Testibus Ricardo
Kintor tunc preposito dicti burgi Johanne Kymdy et Andrea ruthirfurd et Alexandro
scrogis cum multis et diuersis aliis

The xxvj day of marche the yer' g yer' of god et cetera lxiij comperyt marione the
relict' of vmquhile of Johne' of scrogis the fadir quham god assoilze and in Jugement
in presens of richarde of Kyntor aldirman and bailyeis and pur' and simply resignyt and gafe
our' to Johne' of scrogis the son' all richt and clame of richt that scho hade of Intfeftment
of twa croftis the quhilkis the saide Johne' of scrogis the son' hade of his fadir and put hir' in his
will to gif hir' quhat him likis and this was done' in presens of diuers' of the common' consale
than beande present

Item eodem die dominus Alexander yhong canonicus Abirdonensis prelocutor thome Scrogs nepotis
prefa et apparentis heredis prefati Johannis scrogs patris / tunc presentis asseruit quod dictus auus
suus de Jure non debet alienare dicta crofta in exheredacionem et preiudicium ipsius nisi
in certis casibus a Jure permissis / Et si aliqua necessitate sit compulsus ad huiusmodi
croftorum alienacionem / faciendam offerebat amicos ipsius alexandri thome nomine eiusdem
illam supplere in quantum de Jure sibi incumbit quam obrem protestatus fuit nomine quo
supra quod predicta Resignacio aut alienacio dictorum croftorum inde sequend' nullum eidem
thome preiudicium inferat in futurum et cetera

Item xxij die dicti mensis comparens in pretorio prefatus thomas scrogs cum Willelmo
Rede de coliston' auo suo ex parte matris ipse Willelmus prelocutore ipsius thome
idem Willelmus per terras et bona sua optulit se nomine dicti thome supplere necessitatem
prefati Johannis scrogs patris si quam habuit in quantum dictus thomas ipsius necce
necessitatem de Jure supplere tenetur / protestando vt supra / Et vlterius asserens
de quod statuto quodam cauetur quod huiusmodi Resignaciones non debeant fieri nec
recepi nisi consules burgi auisauerint an sit talis resignacio admittenda
vnde extendit plegium in manibus thome Donaldson' vnius seriendorum eiusdem burgi
quod saisina non debeat super huiusmodi resignacione deliberari per balliuos nisi prius vt
premittitur consilium auisauerit an sit legittima uel non / Super quibus pecijt instrumentum
testibus Ricardo Kintor preposito Johanne scrogs filio Andrea meignes et magistro
Johanne levyngston' vicario de Inuervgy cum multis alijs

Item xxjmo die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini Mmo CCCCmo sexagesimo videlicet in curia capitali huius burgi
personaliter comparens prefatus Johannes scrogs pater asseruit et recitauit quomodo alias tam dominus
Alexander yhong canonicus Abirdonensis prelocutor thome scrogs nepotis sui et apparentis heredis
quam Willelmus Rede de coliston' auus ex parte matris eiusdem thome comparens coram preposito et
balliuis huius burgi optulerunt eundem Willelmum et alios amicos dicti thome promptos
et paratos ad supplendum necessitatem et indigenciam ipsius Johannis ita quod non indigeat
eundem Johannem terras suas aut hereditatem alienare quouismodo aut alicui propter huiusmodi
necessitatem in quam incidit fortuito casu vt est omnibus vicinis suis manifestum / Et
quamuis modo dimidia pars anni depost defluxit nullum supplementum percepit ab eisdem et
per huiusmodi vana verba et inania non potest comode sustentari aut releuari Quare solempniter
protestabatur quod huiusmodi oblaciones que non deducuntur ad effectum aut protestaciones desuper facte
sibi aut illis quibus suas terras et possessiones duxerit concedendas nullum preiudicium
inferant in futurum aut impedimentum

Item Consilium concessit et co ordinauit quod daretur Alexandro Douglas deputato vicecomitis pro
laboribus suis penes libertatem burgi et conseruacionem nundinarum iij lib' vj s' viij d'
Et amodo ipse contentabitur secundum quod laborabit

xiijo die dicte mensis prepositus et consules huius burgi matura deliberacione prehabita et
considerata sollicitacione et solercia quam Johannes voket fecit penes conquestum terrarum
de ly Croes cum pertinenciis a Johanne banerman // dicti prepositus et consules assedacionem dictarum
terrarum cum pertinenciis s prefato Johanni voket et assignatis suis per Edmundum banerman
qui in ab ante habuit dictas terras impigneracionem / ad terminum decem annorum
a festo penthecostes proximo futuro proximo complendorum absque interrupcione factam
vnanimj consensu et assensu approbarunt

Curia Gilde tenta per Ricardum Kintor prepositum xxij die mensis februarij Anno Domini
millesimo quadringentesimo quinquagesimo Nono .

Quo die s personaliter comparens Willelmus Rede de Coliston quandam litteram regis
sub signeto presentauit in p curia prefato preposito et balliuis tunc presentibus huiusmodi
sub tenore / James be the grace of god to king of Scottis Til oure aldirmen
and balyheis of oure burowes of Abirdene and perth' greting // for alsmekil as
we ar infourmyt that John' of Scrogs eldar' burges of our said burgh' schapis
him to analy and sellis his landis and annuale Rentis within oure saidis
burowes in preiudice and disherysing of Thomas scrogs his sonnys son' and
apperand air' / the said thomas beyng in tendir age / and sen it affeiris til vs
of law / to defend orphanis and pupillis beyng within age / Oure will is
and we charge yhou / that yhe Ressaue na Resignacion nor give saisyng of
ony landis or annuale Rentis pertenyng to the said John' of Scrogs eldar' within
our' said burrowez in preiudice of the said thomas / his apperand air' / on to the
tyme that the said John' mak knawin to vs / the caus' quhi he wald anali
the said landis or annualez and quhill yhe haue speciale charge and licence of vs
thar'apon vndir al payne and charge that eftir may folou / deliueryng thir'
oure lettres be yhou sene and vndirstandin agayne to the berar' / Gevin vndir
our' Signet of the vnicorn at perth' the viij dai of februar' / And of oure
Regne the xxiij yher' Qua quidem litera ut premittitur lecta prefatus
Willelmus Rede presentans et adducens in Manu sua dictum thomam scrogs
nepotem prefati Johannis scrogs et apparentem heredem / declarauit publice

xiiijto die marcij Anno Domini et cetera lixno / determinatum fuit et declaratum per commune
consilium huius burgi / quod nepos quondam stephani Johnson' tanquam heres eiusdem
nullum habet Jus ad piscariam quam habuit ex assedacione communitatis / nec
eciam Ricardus filius suus habet Jus ad dictam piscariam occasione assignacionis
sibi facti / Sed tamen ex gracia consilij considerato quod prefatus quondam stephanus
laudabiliter se habuit et gessit circa ornacionem ecclesie / et quod dictam
piscariam quamuis non sufficienter prefato Ricardo assignauit pro eisdem terminis
pro quibus sibi fuerat assedata / dictum consilium auisate concessit concessit
dicto Ricardo filio stephanj dictam piscariam pro termino supradicto / sub eadem
ea condicione quod ipse Ricardus soluet et deliberauit procuratori communitatis
huius burgi in flandria citra festum beati michaelis proximum / iij li' g' monete
flandrie pro emendo tantum panni auro contextum quantum pro faciendo vnum
ly baudkin commune ad vsum ecclesie et communitatis / huius burgi in quadrante
conseruando

Item eodem die Andreas culane cum consensu prepositi et consulum assignauit
piscariam sibi assedatam per communitatem / mariorie sponse sue / pro eisdem terminis
sibi assedatis

Item Johannes voket similiter vt supra assignauit piscariam sibi assedatam
